name: green-scarf
effect: Held: Increases the holder’s Smartness during a Super Contest’s Visual Competition.
short_effect: Raises the holder’s Smartness while in a contest.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the “Smart” aspect of the holder in a Contest.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the “Smart” aspect of the holder in a Contest.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the “Smart” aspect of the holder in a Contest in Sinnoh.
